9.4 DUIM-Frames Module

<simple-undoable-command>

Open abstract instantiable class

Summary

The class of simple commands that can contain an undo action.

Superclasses

<object>

Init-keywords

undo-command:
An instance of type <command>.

Library

duim-frames

Module

duim-frames

Description

The class of simple commands that can contain an undo action. A simple undoable command is like a simple command, except that it points to a command that can undo it, represented by the undo-command: init-keyword.

Operations

None.

See also

<simple-command>, page 846

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
